title: Ros Atkins On... Novak Djokovic and Australia
description: As Australia cancels the tennis star's visa on his arrival in Melbourne, Ros Atkins looks at how we got here.

title: Italian mafia boss caught after Google Maps sighting in Spain
description: Gioacchino Gammino had been on the run for two decades, but was spotted in Spain on Google Maps.

title: South Africa's Zondo commission report: Scandal, bullying and fear
description: A report reveals how a business family allegedly secured control of South Africa under ex-President Zuma.

title: Wordle creator promises viral game will stay simple and ad-free
description: The game is the antithesis of ad-laden, attention-grabbing mobile apps, says creator Josh Wardle.

title: Brexit: Did the EU ban crown marks on pint glasses?
description: The government said restoring crown stamps to pints was one of the "key successes" of Brexit so far.

title: Djokovic exemption reaction: 'He might get booed when he gets on court'
description: Australians give their views on Novak Djokovic being able to play in the Australian Open.
